name: For fox sake (itch) (Aramilion, Kottarainen, Kayugames, heropn, Ellyon, jashmine, Casiell)
name_original: For fox sake (itch) (Aramilion, Kottarainen, Kayugames, heropn, Ellyon, jashmine, Casiell)
description:
For Fox Sake

Not everything is as it seems at first glance.
Some problems are just in your head and you play like they are really there.
Will you find all the things this little valley prepared for you?
Will you succeed on an adventure your grandpa send you on?
Check out our extremely cute world in game "For Fox sake"

Controls:

W,S,A,D - walk

Shift - Sprint

Spacebar - Action
1,2,3 - Item Selection

Who we are?
We are HedgehogSoft - team of friends, game developers and artists, game jams pasionates. Authors of the Significant Otter game. Join us on Discord and check out the website!
